column1: #Text=Aang says : " Top of the morning , Momo ! "
#Text=Katara says : " Sounds like you slept well . "
#Text=Aang says : " Like a baby moose lion .
#Text=Gon na get your glow on and hit him with a little Avatar State action ?
#Text=When Azula shot me with lightning , my seventh chakra was locked , cutting off my connection to all the cosmic energy in the universe .
#Text=" Toph says : " You know what I just heard ?
#Text=Blah , blah , spiritual mumbo jumbo blah , blah , something about space .
#Text=Sokka , do you think the fog will delay the invasion ?
